metadata.title: CVE-2014-9356 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - high
metadata.description:
Path traversal vulnerability in Docker before 1.3.3 allows remote attackersto write to arbitrary files and bypass a container protection mechanism viaa full pathname in a symlink in an (1) image or (2) build in a Dockerfile.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9356` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

docker.io - 1.3.3~dfsg1-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: docker.io package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.3~dfsg1-2ubuntu1').
